summary: Simple little add-on for you Archmages out there that allows you to convert your robes between the hoodless and hooded versions at any tanning rack! Also changes the Hoodless robes\' enchantment to the same as the hooded versions, for the +50 Magicka bonus.
descriptionHtml:
Simple little add-on for you Archmages out there that allows you to convert your robes between the hoodless and hooded versions at any tanning rack! Also changes the Hoodless robes\' enchantment to the same as the hooded versions, for the +50 Magicka bonus.

Note: The sexy textures I use for my archmage robes were made by Risenzealot and can be downloaded here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1185

Also check out my other mods
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10184 Soft Leather Armor
and
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9784 Less Frustrating Hard Mode
author: crazyjoe2k

files.name: Convertible Archmage Robes -No Hoodless Magicka Bonus-
files.fileName: Convertible Archmage Robes -No Hoodless Magicka Bonus--10249-1.zip
